data.title: Discussion with Guy Verhofstadt, former Prime Minister of Belgium
data.text:

Gaza’s Water Crisis—What Can Be Done

Live in 1 day

Countering China in the Gray Zone: Lessons from Taiwan

July 26, 2024 • 9:30 – 10:30 am EDT

On behalf of the CSIS Europe Program and the European Parliament Liaison Office with US Congress, you are cordially invited to the a discussion with

Guy Verhofstadt

President, ALDE Group in the European Parliament and former Prime Minister of Belgium"

Please join us for a discussion with Leader of Liberals and Democrats in the European Parliament and former Belgian Prime Minister Guy Verhofstadt. Six years ago at CSIS, Mr. Verhofstadt launched his book The United States of Europe. Mr. Verhofstadt will share his perspective of why the United States of Europe remains the only answer to Europe's sovereign debt crisis.

In addition to examining the euro zone crisis, Mr. Verhofstadt will offer his insights on the internal EU politics related to European fiscal and political governance, Europe's economic growth agenda and the future of European integration and enlargement.

Please RSVP to Alexandra Husted at AHusted@csis.org if you plan to attend.
